meta.description: Internal company social platform for employee connection and directory.

typography.install_instructions: Import 'Outfit' and 'DM Sans' from Google Fonts in index.css. @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:ital,opsz,wght@0,9..40,100..1000;1,9..40,100..1000&family=Outfit:wght@100..900&display=swap');

primary.description: Deep Slate Indigo - Professional, calm, authoritative.

secondary.description: Off-white/light grey for cards and subtle backgrounds.

accent.description: Emerald Green - Used for 'Online' status and positive actions.

usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure primary text is #0F172A on white backgrounds. Use #64748B for secondary text.
usage_rules.no_gradients: Do not use gradients for buttons or main backgrounds. Use solid, matte colors.

grids.directory: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent/10 hover:text-accent h-10 px-4 rounded-md font-medium

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.base: flex h-11 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-400 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 mb-2 block text-slate-700

status_indicator.base: absolute bottom-0 right-0 block rounded-full ring-2 ring-white

login_bg.usage: Full screen background for Login/Signup pages with heavy overlay

empty_state.usage: Use for empty message lists or zero search results

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use slate-500 only on white, not on grey.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have a visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-primary focus state.
accessibility.aria_labels: Buttons with icons only must have aria-label.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for main backgrounds. Keep it matte and clean.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary. White space is luxury.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings (h1-h3) and 'DM Sans' for body.
Do not use generic blue (#3b82f6) for primary actions. Use the defined Slate Indigo.
Every interactive element must have a hover state.
All components must use 'data-testid' attributes for testing.
